title: Hugo and github pages setup
content:
Hugo?    In which I try to set up github pages using Hugo.
 Following instructions from github pages startup up to step 3 Instructions from hugo, although replacing step 3 with the alternate instructions from the geekdoc theme Edited ./config.toml to include the line publishDir = "docs" hugo -D push to github and we are live.  Wrong turns:    Automatic build on commit     Considered, but discarded the idea here, might revisit later to eliminate the hugo building step before pushing to master.  git submodule for theme    I initially did not follow geekdocs instructions and tried to do the github suggested approach of making a submodule, and that created many useless files in my repo. Following this suggestion, I managed to get rid of the dependency, and then followed the directions here again:
